argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.
argument.name: api_key

argument._content: A Flickr Places ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
argument.name: place_id

argument._content: A Where On Earth (WOE) ID. (While optional, you must pass either a valid Places ID or a WOE ID.)
argument.name: woe_id

error._content: One or more required parameter is missing from the API call.
An invalid Places (or WOE) ID was passed with the API call.
No place could be found for the Places (or WOE) ID passed to the API call.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

description._content: Return a list of locations with public photos that are parented by a Where on Earth (WOE) or Places ID.
